snippet: All targets that NATO hit during the bombing of Libya were legitimate military sites, the alliance said Monday, despite the findings of a United Nations panel.
abstract: NATO officials say that all targets that its forces hit during the bombing of Libya were legitimate military strikes, despite findings of a United Nations panel that said 60 civilians were killed and 55 wounded in the airstrikes.
lead_paragraph: All targets that NATO hit during the bombing of Libya were legitimate military sites, the alliance said Monday, despite the findings of a United Nations panel.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
